title: PhonePe | Software Engineer - Web | Bangalore | Nov '23
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 3+ years
Current comp: ~ INR 26 LPA (22 Base + Cash Bonuses + ESOPS)
Prior Experience: Product based company
Date of the Offer: Nov '23
Company: PhonePe
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: INR 25 LPA (Including PF)
Signing Bonus: INR 3L
Stock bonus: ESOPS worth INR 18 L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 32.5L (first year)
Benefits: Standard benefits
Other details: Declined the offer, as I got better offers. Recruiter and Hiring Manager did not negotiate and were lowballing.

title: Infosys | Specialist Programmer | Bangalore | 2023 Grad
content:
Education: B.Tech in CSE from Tier-3 university (2023 Grad)
Years of Experience: 1 year (Internship)
Date of the Offer: Nov 2023
Date of Joining: Feb 2024
Company: Infosys
Title/Level: Specialist Programmer
Location: Mysore (For Training Period)
Salary: INR **807516** (Base+ PF + Gratuity)
Relocation: 0
Performance Bonus: **142500**
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ~ INR 9,50,000
Benefits: Health insurance, Soft loan, Accommodation
OnCampus / OffCampus : On-Campus (Interviewed around JAN 2023)
Interview Experience - https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4540842/Infosys-or-Specialist-Programmer-or-Bangalore-or-2023-Batch-Offer

**REJECTED THIS OFFER AS GOT A BETTER OFFER FROM A PRODUCT BASED COMPANY**
